lead_paragraph: PHIPPS--Ogden Mills ("Dinny") The Board of Governors, Membership and Staff of Deepdale Golf Club note with great sorrow the passing of our esteemed Board Member. Our deepest sympathy is extended to his bereaved family. D. Dixon Boardman, President 1

headline.main: Paid Notice: Memorials  PHIPPS, OGDEN MILLS ("DINNY") THE BOARD OF GOVERNORS, MEMBERSHIP AND STAFF OF DEEPDALE GOLF CLUB NOTE WITH GREAT SORROW THE PASSING OF OUR ESTEEMED BOARD MEMBER. OUR DEEPEST SYMPATHY IS EXTENDED TO HIS BEREAVED FAMILY. D. DIXON BOARDMAN, PRESIDENT 1

snippet: PHIPPS--Ogden Mills ("Dinny") The Board of Governors, Membership and Staff of Deepdale Golf Club note with great sorrow the passing of our esteemed Board Member. Our deepest sympathy is extended to his bereaved family. D. Dixon Boardman, President 1
